content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm interested in your apartment, but I'm a student and I'm looking for the best deal possible. Can you offer me a discount on the rent?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I always aim to provide the best service to my tenants. However, I cannot offer discounts on my apartments. They are competitively priced to ensure a high standard of living for my tenants. If you are a student, I'm sure you'll appreciate the convenience and quality of the apartment. Would you like to make an offer based on the market value?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position. I'm willing to pay €750 per month for the apartment, considering it's a newly built, unfurnished one-bedroom in the city center. Is this a fair price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Yi-Nuo, but €750 per month is not acceptable for this apartment. The location and quality of the property command a higher price. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the quality of the property, Mister Schmidt. However, as a student, I have to consider my budget. Would you be willing to provide any additional amenities or services to make the apartment more attractive to me?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I provide the apartment in its current state, as described. I do not offer additional amenities or services. The value of the apartment is in its location and new construction. If you are interested in the apartment, I recommend you reconsider your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm willing to pay €800 per month for the apartment. This reflects my understanding of the market value for a property of this quality and location. Is this a price we can agree upon?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but €800 per month is still below the market value for this apartment. The location, being in the city center, and the fact that it's a new construction, justifies a higher rent. Would you be willing to go higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm finding it difficult to negotiate with you. I'm trying to reach a fair price for both parties, but you seem inflexible. If you're not willing to consider my offer, I may have to look for other options.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand that you're looking for a fair price, Yi-Nuo. As a landlord, I'm also looking to secure a fair rent that reflects the value of the property. If you're unable to meet the market value, then I'm sorry, but I cannot proceed with your offer. Please consider if the apartment is within your budget, and if you're unable to meet the market rate, I suggest you look for alternatives that better fit your budget.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm disappointed that we couldn't reach an agreement. I was hoping for a more flexible negotiation. Since you're not willing to negotiate further, I don't want to continue the negotiation. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
